item.title: ‘The Beast In Me’ Just Hit A Rare Top 10 Milestone On Netflix After 11 Weeks
item.description: The Beast in Me is performing incredibly on Netflix, hanging on inside the top 10 after 11 weeks. Few shows have managed this.

item.description: Explore how your current state of mind aligns with the different psychological seasons of growth.

item.title: Ian McKellen Leaks Magneto Will Destroy This State In ‘Avengers Doomsday’
item.description: Avengers: Doomsday has given us so little information that its major cast members are starting to give us substantive leaks.

item.title: ‘Dragon Quest VII Reimagined’ Review: Technically Brilliant, But A Bit Clinical
item.description: The latest of the 'Dragon Quest' remakes tackles its seventh instalment, and it’s a remarkable piece of work, if a little clinical.
